attributes.action: kennel club registering non breed standard colours
attributes.additional_details: This is to stop the kennel club registering non breed standard colours . Non  breed standard colours are attained by cross breeding  to create a unnatural colour as they are not natural to the breed and not in there specific breed standard   . The breed standard is created by the kennel club and individual breed council's for each breed  . By registering these non standard colours the kennel club are registering cross breeds (mongrels) with fake pedigree paper's wich dna test would prove it needs to stop as its fraud .
